verses.verse: Then again <WH7725> I lifted up <WH5375> mine eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200>, and <WH5774>, behold, a flying roll <WH4039>.

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH7200>, What seest thou <WH559>? And I answered, I see <WH7200> a flying <WH5774> roll <WH4039>; the length <WH753> thereof is twenty <WH6242> cubits <WH520>, and the breadth <WH7341> thereof ten <WH6235> cubits <WH520>.

Then said <WH559> he unto me <WH423>, This is the curse that goeth forth <WH3318> over the face <WH6440> of the whole land <WH776>: for every one that stealeth <WH1589> shall be cut off <WH5352> on the one side according <WH3644> to it <WH7650>; and every one that sweareth shall be cut off <WH5352> on the other side according to it <WH3644>.

I will cause it to go forth <WH3318>, saith <WH5002> Jehovah <WH3068> of hosts <WH6635>, and it shall enter <WH935> into the house <WH1004> of the thief <WH1590>, and into the house <WH1004> of him that sweareth <WH7650> falsely <WH8267> by my name <WH8034>; and it shall abide <WH3885> in the midst <WH8432> of his house <WH1004>, and shall consume <WH3615> it with the timber <WH6086> thereof and the stones thereof <WH68>.
Then the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me went forth <WH3318>, and said <WH559> unto me <WH5375>, Lift up now thine eyes <WH5869>, and see <WH7200> what is this that goeth forth <WH3318>.
And I said <WH559>, What is it <WH559>? And he said, This is the ephah <WH374> that goeth forth <WH3318>. He said <WH559> moreover <WH5869>, This is their appearance in all the land <WH776>
(and <WH5375>, behold, there was lifted up a talent <WH3603> of lead <WH5777>); and this is a <WH259> woman <WH802> sitting <WH3427> in the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>.

And he said <WH559>, This is Wickedness <WH7564>: and he cast <WH7993> her down into the midst <WH8432> of the ephah <WH374>; and he cast <WH7993> the weight <WH68> of lead <WH5777> upon the mouth thereof <WH6310>.

Then lifted I up <WH5375> mine eyes <WH5869>, and saw <WH7200>, and <WH3318>, behold, there came forth two <WH8147> women <WH802>, and the wind <WH7307> was in their wings <WH3671>; now they had <WH2007> wings <WH3671> like the wings <WH3671> of a stork <WH2624>; and they lifted up <WH5375> the ephah <WH374> between earth <WH776> and heaven <WH8064>.
Then said <WH559> I to the angel <WH4397> that talked <WH1696> with me <WH3212>, Whither do these bear the ephah <WH374>?

And he said <WH559> unto me <WH1129>, To build her a house <WH1004> in the land <WH776> of Shinar <WH8152>: and when it is prepared <WH3559>, she shall be set <WH3240> there in her own place <WH4369>.
